chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This guide contains installation and configuration information for system administrators installing Dynamic Accounts. It explains how to install, configure and test the installation.

important.simpara: This information is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the System Administrator's Guide. Read through this guide before continuing!
